title: Youâ€™ll soon be able to cast content from different services directly in Google TV
content:
Soon, the Google TV app on your phone will be able to cast content directly to your Android TV without the need for third-party apps. This should be a major step in streamlining the viewing experience at home, since you can easily find the content you want to watch in one place and then start

The post You’ll soon be able to cast content from different services directly in Google TV appeared first on XDA.
description: Google is making it easier than ever to cast movies and shows from your phone to your TV by bringing a cast button directly into Google TV.
